HERO.TITLE: 去中心化投資的未來
HERO.SUBTITLE: 參與創建基於區塊鏈代幣的真實公司。我們使機構投資機會民主化。

ABOUT.TITLE: 關於BW代幣
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: 真實資產。真實價值。真實區塊鏈。
ABOUT.HEADING: 連接加密與真實經濟的橋樑
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: BW Token solves the trust crisis in crypto by connecting blockchain with real enterprises. Each token represents fractional ownership of verified real-world companies, eliminating vaporware and providing tangible asset backing.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION2: Our infrastructure ensures legal compliance, transparent audits, and direct capital flow from enterprise profits to token holders through automated buy-back mechanisms.
ABOUT.LENDING_DESC: Democratize access to private equity investments. What was once exclusive to institutional investors is now available to any BW holder through fractional ownership of real enterprises.
ABOUT.WALLET_DESC: Every BW token is backed by verifiable real-world assets. Our Proof of Asset system and real-time dashboards ensure transparency and eliminate the 'vaporware' problem plaguing crypto.

FEATURES.TITLE: 核心特性
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: What Makes BW Token Unique
FEATURES.SECURITY_DESC: BEP-3643 standard compliance with integrated KYC/AML protocols. External audits from leading firms. Legal entity ownership through BW Holding Ltd structure.
FEATURES.LENDING_DESC: Token holders vote on enterprise selection, portfolio management, and protocol decisions. Staking requirements prevent manipulation. Direct influence on ecosystem growth.
FEATURES.WALLET_DESC: 30% of enterprise net profits fuel token buy-backs in open markets. Create upward price pressure while benefiting all holders. Burn mechanism until 50% supply reduction.

ROADMAP.TITLE: Development Timeline
ROADMAP.SUBTITLE: 2027-2028 Launch & Growth Strategy
ROADMAP.PHASE1_DESC: Public website deployment. White paper release. Community building begins. KYC infrastructure setup for compliance.
ROADMAP.PHASE2_DESC: TGE on PancakeSwap. Initial liquidity deployment. First governance voting period opens for Enterprise #1 selection.
ROADMAP.PHASE3_DESC: Legal constitution of BW Holding Ltd. Smart contract audits completed. Angel investor allocation begins.
ROADMAP.PHASE4_DESC: Community votes select first real enterprise. Funding deployment. Operations begin. Real profit generation starts.

NEWS.TITLE: 最新更新
NEWS.SUBTITLE: Project Developments & Announcements
NEWS.ARTICLE_1_DESC: BW Token goes live on January 30, 2027. Historical moment: real assets meet blockchain.
NEWS.ARTICLE_2_DESC: Complete tokenomics, governance structure, and technical specifications for BW Token ecosystem published.
NEWS.ARTICLE_3_DESC: Security audit completed. BEP-3643 compliance verified. Ready for mainnet deployment.

FAQS.TITLE: 常見問題
FAQS.SUBTITLE: Learn About BW Token
FAQS.QUESTION_8: When is the Investor Dashboard ready?
FAQS.ANSWER_1: BW Token is a cryptocurrency that represents fractional ownership of real, verified enterprises. Unlike traditional crypto, every token is backed by verifiable real-world assets and generates real profits.
FAQS.ANSWER_2: Tokenization converts ownership stakes in real companies into digital tokens on blockchain. This allows fractional ownership, transparent transfer, and democratic governance through smart contracts.
FAQS.ANSWER_3: BW tokens are backed by real enterprises owned through BW Holding Ltd legal structure. Investors verify asset existence through our Proof of Asset system and real-time dashboards.
FAQS.ANSWER_4: Purchase BW tokens on PancakeSwap starting January 30, 2027. Complete KYC verification. Stake tokens to participate in enterprise selection governance voting.
FAQS.ANSWER_5: 30% of enterprise profits are used to buy BW tokens in open markets, creating constant upward price pressure. These tokens are either burned (reducing supply) or distributed as dividends to holders.
FAQS.ANSWER_6: Community members holding staked BW tokens vote on which real enterprises to finance from the asset treasury. This democratic process begins in Q4 2027.
FAQS.ANSWER_7: BEP-3643 is a blockchain standard for security tokens with integrated compliance, KYC/AML protocols, and identity verification. It ensures legal compliance and investor protection.
FAQS.ANSWER_8: The Investor Dashboard launches in Q1-Q2 2028, providing real-time visibility into enterprise revenues, profit distributions, and token buy-back activities.

WHITEPAPER.EXECUTIVE_SUMMARY_TEXT: Back & White Token (BW) 是一個創新的去中心化投資代幣化項目，通過區塊鏈技術民主化機構投資機會的訪問。我們將投資者與經過驗證的真實公司聯繫起來，提供透明性、安全性和有形回報。
WHITEPAPER.VISION_TEXT: 成為拉丁美洲領先的現實世界資產 (RWA) 代幣化平台，為所有人提供可訪問的去中心化投資。
WHITEPAPER.MISSION_TEXT: 通過創建基於區塊鏈的真實代幣化公司，民主化機構投資機會的訪問，確保透明性、安全性和監管合規性。
WHITEPAPER.SMART_CONTRACTS: 經過認可的安全公司審計的智能合約
WHITEPAPER.DAO_GOVERNANCE: 去中心化治理 (DAO) 用於社區決策
WHITEPAPER.KYC_AML: 集成的 KYC/AML 合規性，用於監管安全
WHITEPAPER.INSTITUTIONAL_SECURITY: 機構級安全性與資產保護
WHITEPAPER.Q1_2026: 網站啟動和最終白皮書
WHITEPAPER.Q2_2026: 智能合約審計和戰略合作夥伴關係
WHITEPAPER.Q3_2026: 公開 ICO 和社區投資階段
WHITEPAPER.Q4_2026: 在去中心化和中心化交易所上市
WHITEPAPER.RISKS_INTRO: 與任何加密資產投資一樣，您應該考慮相關風險：
WHITEPAPER.REGULATORY_RISKS: 不同司法管轄區的監管風險
WHITEPAPER.TECH_RISKS: 區塊鏈固有的技術風險
WHITEPAPER.DISCLAIMER: 這是一份臨時文件，僅供參考。完整的白皮書將很快發布，包含完整的技術信息。
